content.text: Bug fixes, security patches, and stability improvements.
Goal: Maintain platform stability and security.
New platform features and enhancements across BrightAgent, WebApp, and Platform Core.
Goal: Deliver value through new features and improvements.
AWS infrastructure, DevOps practices, and deployment automation.
Goal: Robust, scalable, and automated infrastructure.
Software Development Lifecycle improvements and code quality initiatives.
Goal: Maintain high code quality and sustainable development practices.
